newsitem.title: PANAMA: Port conditions -Panama Canal - Lloyds Shipping.
newsitem.headline: Port conditions -Panama Canal - Lloyds Shipping.

text.p: Port conditions from Lloyds Shipping Intelligence Service --
BALBOA, July 19 - Congestion as a result of lock maintenance at Gatun and Miraflores (which due to have been completed over weekend).
Queue of vessels for Balboa and Cristobal estimated at 89 on July 21.
Canal commission said, from July 21, temporary increase in reservation fees will be applied. Vessels will have option of cancelling reservation without penalty.
